nodes.text: The TSMEU-6 personal wheel bike, also known simply as the wheel bike, was a model of personal wheel bike manufactured by the Z-Gomot Ternbuell Guppat Corporation.

The bike had four retractable legs that allowed it to climb steep inclines and was armed with a double laser cannon. It proved popular in mining areas, as it facilitated long-distance underground travel over a variety of terrains.

General Grievous used a wheel bike during the Confederacy of Independent Systems's invasion of Utapau. Sometime later, the Confederacy had at least three TSMEU-6s in their possession inside of a modified core ship on Utapau. Grievous used one of these during the Battle of Utapau.
